task.title: Check whether StageVideo is available
task.shortdesc: If StageVideo is unavailable, and your application tries to use StageVideo, the does not issue an error. Your application can determine whether StageVideo is available by listening for the StageVideoAvailabilityEvent.

context.p: From Flash 15 and later, when hardware StageVideo is not available, it will fall back to software StageVideo. For Flash 14 and earlier, you can determine whether StageVideo is available. If StageVideo is not available, you can use StageVideoAvailabilityEvent to understand why it is unavailable.

step.cmd: Listen for StageVideoAvailabilityEvent to determine whether StageVideo is available.
If StageVideo is not available, check flash.media.StageVideoAvailabilityReason.
